pr_title: Add portal configuration properties relating to survival tab

timeline.bodyText: better to have these commented out than set to nothing
timeline.author: alisman
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -199,6 +199,12 @@ mycancergenome.show=true
 # Enable transcript switch dropdown (true, false)
 # show.transcript_dropdown=false
 
+# Show/hide p- and q-values in survival types table (default is true)
+survival.show_p_q_values_in_survival_type_table=

timeline.message:
Add portal configuration properties relating to survival tab
